info.author: Ben Hayden
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Takes a Natural Language [English] description of a date and/or time, and
returns that date in ISO or a specified format.
Example inputs: 'today', 'now', 'tomorrow', 'yesterday', '1 month 2 days 3 wks 4
minutes from now', '42 hrs 42 seconds ago', 'now+ 42 days 42 weeks', 'jan 12',
'jUlY 28 1996 23:59:59'.
info.keywords: date time strptime strftime english natural language ai
info.name: when
info.html_description: Takes a Natural Language [English] description of a date and/or time, and returns that date in ISO or a specified format. Example inputs: ‘today’, ‘now’, ‘tomorrow’, ‘yesterday’, ‘1 month 2 days 3 wks 4 minutes from now’, ‘42 hrs 42 seconds ago’, ‘now+ 42 days 42 weeks’, ‘jan 12’, ‘jUlY 28 1996 23:59:59’.
